section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Contracting party" means the other party to a contract made by a district under this section.

"Contracting party's system" means any of the following systems owned or operated by a contracting party:
A sewerage system.
A solid waste acceptance facility.
A solid waste disposal system.
A water system.

text.section:
If its sanitary commission approves, a district may make a contract with a contracting party:
To buy services from the contracting party's system;
To use the facilities of the contracting party's system; or
To allow a contracting party or its customers to use the services or facilities of the district.

Any contract made under this section:
Shall require that the fees, rates, or charges collected under the contract be sufficient to pay the obligations of the contracting party; and
May allow a contracting party to collect from its customers the fees, rates, or charges due under the contract.
A contract made under this section is for the benefit of holders of the district's bonds.
